# caTransform3DValue

**Instance Property**

The CoreAnimation transform structure representation of the value.

## Declaration

```swift
var caTransform3DValue: CATransform3D { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **CATransform3D**: The standard transform matrix used throughout Core Animation.

## Working with CoreAnimation Transform Values

- **init(CATransform3D:)**: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreAnimation transform structure.
